# About

This folder stores all files related to getting and cleaning data, Data Science Specialization on Coursera [course link](https://www.coursera.org/learn/exploratory-data-analysis/home/welcome)

This README.rmd file also serves as a template for R notebook files. Copy and paste the metadata for fast setup

# Organization

Below is the list of assignments and naming strategy

* Week 1 quiz: w1qz
* Course Project 1: proj1
* Week 2 quiz: w2qz
* Course project 2: proj2

# Project submission

* Create a subfolder in the public repo for submission. Do not change the files in the pub repo. Instead, pub repo is merely where to copy prepared files to.
